about_the_game:
The Builder* artifact set promotes your character`s development. Your buildings will be constructed even faster and the number of buildings being errected at the same time increases. Defensive buildings of your domain will become even stronger and their repair time gets reduced.

Items included:
  • Builder's Armour
  • Builder's Belt
  • Leather Boots of Slowdown
  • Builder's Barbute
  • Magic Builder's Saw
  • Talisman of Restricted Construction
  • Ring of Complicated Construction
  • Builder's Battle-Axe
  • Builder's Shield

* make sure to construct the Vault in your Capital in order to receive the artifacts
